level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This chapter applies to a collaborative law participation agreement that meets the requirements of ยง 16-4004 signed on or after the effective date of this chapter [May 9, 2012].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-125
level.text: For history of Law 19-125, see notes under ยง 16-4001.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 3 of the Uniform Collaborative Law Act.
